Background Tasks

This module handles asynchronous background tasks using Celery.

Tasks module for the Store API application. This module defines Celery tasks for asynchronous processing, including email sending and image generation features.

exception storeapi.tasks.APIResponseError[source]

Bases: Exception

Exception raised when an API request fails. Provides information about HTTP status codes and error details.

Celery Configuration

Celery configuration module for the Store API application. This module initializes and configures the Celery instance for background task processing.
